alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Warren; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 4:34PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Showers with gusty winds will impact portions of southern Hamilton, northwestern Warren, western Fulton, southern Herkimer and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 433 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers with gusty winds along a line extending from 11 miles west of Speculator to near Stratford to near Gilbertsville. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ilion, Herkimer, Little Falls, Canajoharie, Speculator, Mohawk, Frankfort, Fort Plain, Dolgeville, St. Johnsville, Ephratah, West Winfield, Lake Pleasant, Wells, Newport, Stratford, Middleville, Caroga Lake Public Campground, Jordanville and Moffitt Beach Campground. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 29 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized ponding of water on roads.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Warren; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer
